Articles.Content:
Multi-Copter Maximum Altitude Hover Challenge

Rules:

Craft

Must use electric motors from the Firespitter mod.

No liquid fuels allowed.

No user "modified" parts

No dev console or ridiculous parts clipping

Challenge

Takeoff

Climb to max Alt.

Must hold stationary hover for at least 10 sec (<5m/sec movement)

Land in one piece

Judging

We'll do "stock" and FAR categories. And possibly Manned and Un-Manned (Un-Kerbaled?)?

Must provide sufficient photo/video proof.

This is my entry for the "Multi-Copter Maximum Altitude Hover Challenge". (FAR and Firespitter mods)

Max Alt Hover: 14,000m

Edited December 29, 2013 by g00bd0g
Dont some of the firespitter engines use liquid fuel? So this is an electric-only challenge?
Actually a multi copter is two.. And a quad is 4.
Yes, electric only. But any combination of batteries/solar/rtg allowed.
